Merchandising and Digital Marketing Workshop Fort Lauderdale, FL Wednesday, April 15, 2015
Please join us on Wednesday, April 15 in Fort Lauderdale, FL when Darrel Ferguson, Senior Performance Manager at vAuto, and Anthony Sudon, Major Accounts Manager at Haystak, will conduct a Merchandising and Digital Marketing Workshop.
Darrel will conduct a basic "tune-up" review of vAuto Merchandising tools and best practices for dealership online classifieds to help maximize a dealership's online presence.
Anthony will present an in-depth look at the online industry and provide you with strategies you can implement immediately to maximize your online presence.
This workshop is complimentary to all vAuto customers and is recommended for General Managers, General Sales Managers, Pre-Owned Sales Managers, Internet, BDC and anyone involved in the dealershipâ€™s "online get ready" and marketing processes.
Workshop Highlights:
- Identification of common online merchandising pitfalls and tips to avoid them - Provide specific vAuto application training and review of basic best practices - Discussion of industry trends and search engine evolution - Review new SEO/SEM-related technologies that are available today - Review the metrics that can be utilized in measuring SEO/SEM effectiveness and improving ROI - Learn 5 simple, key takeaways that can be implemented immediately at your dealership
Location: Courtyard Fort Lauderdale North/Cypress Creek 2440 W. Cypress Creek Road Fort Lauderdale, FL 33309 (954) 772-7770
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Registration: Please use this link to register <http://go.vauto.com/Fort-Lauderdale-Workshop-April-15.html> your attendees by April 8th. You will have to fill out the form for each person you would like to register. Once you submit the form, you will receive a confirmation email.
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Courtyard Fort Lauderdale North/Cypress Creek, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/fllcp-courtyard-fort-lauderdale-north-cypress-creek/> or call the hotel directly at (954) 772-7770.
I hope you can join Darrel and Anthony on April 15th.
John
